name: Client acceptance questionnaire
description: How to decide to accept or not a client

questions: Is the client wealthy enough to afford the project?
Does the client have the means to make the payments?
Is the project mission critical to the client?
Is the client willing to facilitate all the given resources?
Will the client be actively involved in the project?
Has the client worked with similar providers before?
Does the client know the limitations of the industry?
Will the client understand technical explanations about the project?
